recipesJson.name: Fuji Forest
recipesJson.author: seanrus99
recipesJson.description:
Sweet Fuji goodness. The Apple Fuji really shines here as the top note, got love it. Then the Forrest Mix takes over, while both Peaches sweeten things up just right.
I put the Cactus in there for more juiciness not totally needed. You might want to try Koolada (TPA) @ 1% or Polar Blast (FA) @ 2% for some coolness up to you.

reviews.text: A little preamble-I mixed this with 1% Koolada instead of Polar Blast. I get a lot of the Forrest Mix on the intake, with a nice sweet, cold peach exhale. I plan to drop the sweetener down to 1% on the next bottle I make just because its a bit sweet for me. Still a damn good recipe thats going into my daily rotation
